name: The Dark Lord Huggington
description:
The Dark Lord Huggington By Ryan LaPlante (@theryanlaplante)

Once a fearsome warlord, you awake from your thousand year slumber to find your dread realm overtaken by cuddly creatures! Will you succumb to their cheerful ways, or rise again and bring fear to the realm?

A Choose-Your-Own-Ending interactive fiction story developed by Tap Studios.

Check us out on-the-go in the Tap app! Available from the App Store and Google Play.
